abstract: The Walt Disney Company became Hollywood’s leading player in the booming social gaming business on Tuesday with the purchase of Playdom in a deal valued at $763.2 million.
snippet: The Walt Disney Company became Hollywood’s leading player in the booming social gaming business on Tuesday with the purchase of Playdom in a deal valued at $763.2 million.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES –- The Walt Disney Company became Hollywood’s leading player in the booming social gaming business on Tuesday with the purchase of Playdom in a deal that could be worth up to $763.2 million.

headline.main: Disney Purchases Playdom, a Social Game Start-Up

byline.original: By Brooks Barnes and Claire Cain Miller

abstract: The Walt Disney Company became Hollywood’s leading player in the booming social gaming business on Tuesday with the purchase of Playdom in a deal valued at $763.2 million.
snippet: The Walt Disney Company became Hollywood’s leading player in the booming social gaming business on Tuesday with the purchase of Playdom in a deal valued at $763.2 million.
lead_paragraph: From Brooks Barnes and Claire Cain Miller at Media Decoder:

headline.main: Disney Buying Playdom in $763 Million Deal

abstract: Disney buys a casual gaming company for $563.2 million. Playdom is the No. 3 gaming company on Facebook.
snippet: Disney buys a casual gaming company for $563.2 million. Playdom is the No. 3 gaming company on Facebook.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company became Hollywood’s leading player in the booming social gaming business on Tuesday with the purchase of Playdom in a deal valued at $763.2 million.
